item.description:
After we play we will all be hungry so how about we indulge in a buffet of Southern style BBQ.

The buffet menu is not completely set but I believe this is what we will be "chowing down" on (Drinks not included).

BBQ Chicken
Pulled Pork
Chopped BBQ Beef
Mashed Potatoes and Gravy
Coleslaw
Corn on the Cob
Rolls
Homemade Pickles
and Lesters own BBQ sauces

The cost will be $16 pp and will include gratuity. If you choose to pay online the cost will be $17 which is higher to accodate the fee's we are charged.

To pay by mail please mail the check to (be sure to inlude the event name):
The Fun Singles
P.O. Box 1382
Westford, MA 01886

You can also choose to pay us directly if you see us at an event all we ask is that you put the payment in an envelope that has your name and the event name on it.

One last note: If you rsvp Maybe or Yes and we do not have your payment 5 days before the event we will have to change your RSVP to a no.
item.how_to_find_us: It is not a big place so we will be hard to miss!
item.name: Lester Roadside BBQ
